languages.text: "Я исполню долг, к которому меня готовили все эти годы. Пускай мое становление... и прошло при багровых тонах".
"I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."
languages.original_text: "Я исполню долг, к которому меня готовили все эти годы. Пускай мое становление... и прошло при багровых тонах".

traits.locale_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我愿意履行我这些年来一直学习的职责，尽管我是在血染的旗帜之下，被迫接受了这样的职位。”
languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意履行我这些年来一直学习的职责，尽管我是在血染的旗帜之下，被迫接受了这样的职位。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je compte bien accomplir le devoir pour lequel je m'entraîne depuis tant d'années, et ce, même si j'ai été nommée sous une bannière aux tons écarlates. »
languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

traits.locale_text: « Je compte bien accomplir le devoir pour lequel je m'entraîne depuis tant d'années, et ce, même si j'ai été nommée sous une bannière aux tons écarlates. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde die Pflicht erfüllen, für die ich jahrelang ausgebildet wurde. Auch wenn meine Ernennung unter einem roten Banner stattgefunden hat."
languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Pflicht erfüllen, für die ich jahrelang ausgebildet wurde. Auch wenn meine Ernennung unter einem roten Banner stattgefunden hat."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「長年にわたり訓練を受けてきたのです、私の務めを果たしましょう。私の任務が深紅の旗の元で行われるものだとしても」
languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

traits.locale_text: 「長年にわたり訓練を受けてきたのです、私の務めを果たしましょう。私の任務が深紅の旗の元で行われるものだとしても」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cumpliré el deber para el que he estado entrenando todos estos años, a pesar de que mi nombramiento haya tenido lugar bajo tonos de escarlata».
languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

traits.locale_text: «Cumpliré el deber para el que he estado entrenando todos estos años, a pesar de que mi nombramiento haya tenido lugar bajo tonos de escarlata».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

languages.text: "Görevlendirmem kızıl bir bayrağın gölgesinde gerçekleşmiş olsa da yıllardır eğitimini aldığım vazifemi icra etmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "I will fulfil the duty for which I have been training all these years, even though my appointment took place under a banner of crimson tones."

traits.locale_text: "Görevlendirmem kızıl bir bayrağın gölgesinde gerçekleşmiş olsa da yıllardır eğitimini aldığım vazifemi icra etmeliyim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
